{{Lang|'''Kirara'''|ja=綺良々|ja_rm=Kirara}} is a playable {{Dendro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A [[youkai]] &mdash; a nekomata, specifically &mdash; Kirara is the Gold Level Courier of the [[Inazuma]]-based [[Komaniya Express]]. Her diligence in ensuring every package would be delivered to the right place has increased her company's renown and hers, making her the sole courier handling international deliveries.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Roll! A Sea of New Acquaintances}}</ref> She enjoys every delivery she makes as she considers these outings for herself.
